name: Slingshot Director
description:
It's an alley marksman's time trial.
Exercise your accuracy and complete all the objectives in the shortest amount of time possible.

Drag and Drop your ammunition in order to direct your slingshot's projectiles near and far. Entirely controlled by mouse cursor.  If the embed is too large for your monitor, click the blue full-screen button in the bottom right.

This has been another 72 hour Game Jam with Score Space!
Theme: "Direction", accompanied by timed high-scores.

All art, models, textures, design and scripting by Austin Ashley.
I regrettably did not have time to implement sound or music; stay tuned for their addition in the future.

webGL version may not work in the itch.io client. please play in browser :)
